name: Medical ID Template 🏥🆔 (New: Auto-Layout)
description:
Be prepared for emergencies


This year I got a diagnosis and my doctor issued me a medical ID - but it was handwritten in German. I was really afraid of what would happen if I was abroad as a digital nomad and the local doctor had no idea what it said.


  • I wanted to prepared for accidents but had doubts about the accessibility of the built-in 📱 iOS / Android ICE features.


  • I was looking for Medical IDs / ICE (In Case of Emergency) - templates that look pleasing, official and are easy to fill in. After some research and brainstorming on alternative approaches (bracelets with e-paper display displaying country-dependant information)


  • I decided to create my own - and now you can use it as well. 🙌


It uses the new Figma layout features, so it is designed to adapt to the content you want to add and is not fixed in size.


Just duplicate the Figma file and use it for your very personal Medical ID 🎉
